00041 void MenuForm::CreateGUIControls()
00042 {
00043         //Do not add custom code between
00044         //GUI Items Creation Start and GUI Items Creation End.
00045         //wxDev-C++ designer will remove them.
00046         //Add the custom code before or after the blocks

00059         btnOK->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00060

00062         edIcon->SetFont(wxFont(8, wxSWISS, wxNORMAL,wxNORMAL, false, wxT("Tahoma")));
00063
